Package fr.utbm.da50.freelyforms.core.controller

Class PrefabController

java.lang.Object
fr.utbm.da50.freelyforms.core.controller.PrefabController
@RequestMapping("api/prefabs") @RestController public class PrefabController extends Object
Controller for the Prefab API Answers requests to the /api/prefabs/ route
Author:
Pourriture

  • Method Details

    • getAllPrefabs

      @GetMapping("") @ResponseBody public List<Prefab> getAllPrefabs()
      GET /api/prefabs
      Returns:
      all prefabs in the database

    • getPrefab

      @GetMapping("{name}") @ResponseBody public Prefab getPrefab(@PathVariable("name") String name)
      GET /api/prefabs/{prefabName}
      Parameters:
      name - name of the prefab
      Returns:
      the prefab of name prefaName

    • postPrefab

      @PostMapping("") @ResponseBody public Prefab postPrefab(@RequestBody Prefab newPrefab)
      POST /api/prefabs/
      Parameters:
      newPrefab - a prefab to add, unless a prefab of the same name already exists
      Returns:
      the added prefab

    • patchPrefab

      @RequestMapping(value="{name}", method={PATCH,PUT}) @ResponseBody public Prefab patchPrefab(@PathVariable("name") String name, @RequestBody Prefab patchedPrefab)
      PATCH/PUT /api/prefabs/{prefabName}
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the prefab to modify
      patchedPrefab - the new version of that prefab
      Returns:
      the modified prefab

    • deletePrefab

      @DeleteMapping("{name}") public boolean deletePrefab(@PathVariable("name") String name)
      DELETE /api/prefabs/{prefabName} This method should require elevated privileges in the future.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the prefab to delete
      Returns:
      true if the prefab has been successfully deleted
